original_text: Of whom we have many things to say, and hard to be uttered, seeing ye are dull of hearing.
korean_text: 멜기세덱에 관하여는 우리가 할 말이 많으나 너희가 듣는 것이 둔하므로 설명하기 어려우니라

sentences.original_text: Of whom we have many things to say
sentences.korean_translation: 그에 대하여 우리가 말할 것이 많으나

sentences.original_text: seeing ye are dull of hearing
